channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: Record snowfall buries Russian town
item.description: Russia's Far Eastern Kamchatka Peninsula saw its biggest snow fall in 60 years.

item.title: Rep. Julia Letlow jumps into Louisiana Senate race with Trump's backing
item.description: GOP Rep. Julia Letlow is jumping into the Louisiana Senate race after President Trump encouraged her to challenge Sen. Bill Cassidy in the state's pri...

item.title: Surrounded by billionaires in Davos, Trump plans to lay out how he’ll make housing more affordable
What to expect from Davos amid Trump's Greenland standoff with European allies
item.description: President Trump is set to head to Davos, Switzerland, on Tuesday for the World Economic Forum as tensions continue to heighten with European allies. C...

item.title: Trump posts texts from European leaders on Greenland threats
item.description: President Trump is making public the reactions from European leaders to his Greenland takeover bid. CBS News' Natalie Brand and Ramy Inocencio report.

item.title: WATCH: Celebrating the life of Valentino
item.description: Legendary fashion designer Valentino Garavani, known simply as Valentino, died Monday, according to a post shared on his Instagram page.

item.title: WATCH: The biggest moments from the national college football championship
item.description: The Indiana Hoosiers are national champions, going from one of the worst teams in college football a couple of years ago to the very best after beatin...

item.title: Netflix revises its offer for Warner Bros. Discovery, making it all cash
item.description: The streaming service is sweetening its offer amid Paramount Skydance's hostile takeover bid for the Hollywood studio.

item.title: WATCH: Sahara Desert gets rare dusting of snow
item.description: Sand dunes in the Sahara Desert got turned an unusual shade this week, after receiving a rare dusting of snow.

item.title: Freezing temperatures hitting US this week: How to stay safe in the cold
item.description: Here's what to know about staying warm and safe during freezing temperatures.

item.title: European Union leader calls Trump's tariff threat over Greenland a mistake
item.description: As the EU calls Trump's threat to tariff allies for rejecting his bid for Greenland a mistake, Denmark's leader laments "being threatened by our close...

item.title: US citizen says ICE removed him from his Minnesota home in his underwear after warrantless search
Christian leaders urge protecting worshippers’ rights after protesters interrupt service
item.description: Several faith leaders are urgently calling for protecting the rights of worshippers while also expressing compassion for migrants.
